subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Street Sense (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: BOYNTON BEACH, Fla. — “Come and pet him,” Rick Dutrow commanded the other morning as Big Brown nuzzled his nose into his trainer’s shoulder. “Really, he’s one of the neatest horses I’ve ever been around.”.
snippet: BOYNTON BEACH, Fla. — “Come and pet him,” Rick Dutrow commanded the other morning as Big Brown nuzzled his nose into his trainer’s shoulder. “Really, he’s one of the neatest horses I’ve ever been around.”.
